official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the appreciation of the Congress to the City of Philadelphia, the National Park Service, and We the People 200, Inc., for their hospitality during the July 16, 1987, ceremonies commemorating the bicentennial of the Great Compromise.

summary.text: Expresses the appreciation of the Congress to the City of Philadelphia, the National Park Service, and We the People 200, Inc., for their hospitality during the ceremonies commemorating the bicentennial of the Great Compromise.
